name: Welcome to Beckvale [GGJ19]
description:
A game about going to a fictional town that feels more like home than your hometown ever did. It's definitely not Animal Crossing meets MS Paint. Really, it isn't. Maybe.

Made in www.flickgame.org, drawn with a mouse. I wanted to use this project as a bit of an experiment on focusing on my art skills.

Emotional support from Sarah, Jo, Naomi, Katy, Siobhan and Amy. Made at the Brighton UK Global Game Jam 2019 site amongst all my site organiser duties.

Animal Crossing: New Leaf was made by Nintendo

The game fulfills the following diversifiers:

Language-Independence (Sponsored by Valve Software)
4′33″
Assetless
